sentences.sContent: The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.sContent_eng: The castle dates from the 1500s and has a rustic charm, reminiscent of a grand West Country manor.
sentences.sCn: 城堡的历史可追溯到1500年代，极富乡村魅力，令人回忆起西南各郡的庄园。

sentences.sContent: Dragon manor senior clubs set the function of advanced SPA, chess room, restaurant, conference room and other areas.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dragon manor senior clubs set the function of advanced SPA, chess room, restaurant, conference room and other areas.
sentences.sCn: 龙脉庄园高级会所集合了高级SPA、棋牌室、餐厅、会议室等多种功能区域。

phrases.pCn: n. 领主之宅邸；庄园主的住宅

remMethod.val: man(人) + or(表物) → 人靠自己的力量建立起来的 → 领地

trans.tranOther: a big old house with a large area of land around it
